title: Council TUI + Builder Mode
description:
Goal: turn the existing Beads-backed council CLI into an interactive neo-blessed TUI where a user can ask questions, watch the council deliberate live, answer council questions when needed (with timeouts), and optionally enter a plan mode that creates dev-tracker Beads issues and can delegate work to a coding agent.

Constraints / decisions:
- One council session == one Beads issue thread in `.council/.beads/`.
- Agents can discuss freely; keep structured output lightweight.
- Repo-aware: council may read the repo as needed (tool-like, scoped context).
- Creating dev issues requires explicit user confirmation.
- Delegation is optional; work on current git branch.

Non-goals (for this epic):
- Web UI.
- Automatic PR/branch management.

title: Protocol v2: discussion-first agent output
description:
Replace the current large structured response shape with a lightweight schema that supports freeform discussion while still enabling:
- incremental rounds (continue/done)
- asking user questions
- emitting typed artifacts (for plan mode)

Keep backwards compatibility where reasonable, or migrate providers + engine in one coordinated change.
close_reason: All children completed

title: Define v2 agent response schema (message-first)
description:
Update the agent output contract to be discussion-first.

Proposed shape (exact names TBD):
- required: agent, round, phase, message, need_another_round, chair_score, chair_reason
- optional: questions_for_user[], assumptions[], artifacts[]

Notes:
- Keep artifacts compatible with existing artifact persistence.
- Minimize prompt brittleness.
acceptance_criteria: src/schema.ts updated; providers + engine compile; schema supports freeform message, questions_for_user, artifacts.
close_reason: Implemented v2 message-first schema + parser

title: Adjust transcript formatting for v2 (discussion-centric)

- include a compact footer for continue/done + chair score

acceptance_criteria: Beads comments render as readable discussion; minimal boilerplate; artifacts still linked.
close_reason: Format now renders message/questions/assumptions + compact footer
